summary: On his own wedding day, sheriff Pat Garrett must leave and try to arrest two bank robbers.
cast: Rod Cameron|Ángel Aranda|Horst Frank|Mimmo Palmara|Hans Nielsen|Andrea Aureli|Vivi Bach|Kai Fischer|Tito García|Eulalia Tenorio|Luis Durán|Giulia Rubini|Joe Kamel|José Manuel Martín|Manuel Arbó|Simón Arriaga|Juan Cortés|Gonzalo de Esquiroz|Guillermo Méndez|Julio Pérez Tabernero|Rafael Vaquero
director: Director: Mario Caiano (as Fred Wilson, Manfred Riegert, Mike Perkins)
title: Las pistolas no discuten
